segments.text: Tomorrow is Sunday . Let's go out and get some fresh air .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know there is a beautiful farm in the countryside near Taipei . Are you interested in going there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: why not ? I love animals and I love nature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can see many cows and horses there . lf you are brave enough , you can try horseback riding . it is fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sounds very interesting . I can't wait to go there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! It is huge and you can do many activities here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is true . Some people go camping , some people pick fresh fruit , some people go boating and some people go grass skiing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I never knew there were so many fun things to do on a farm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , now you know . Let's go to the lake over there . Some people are fishing over there . I haven't had a chance to fish in a lake , I really want to try .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think we need to buy some baits and borrow some fish poles first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . we can get what we need at the stands right by the lake . Who do you think will catch a big fish first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait and see . I want to try horseback riding after fishing . It looks very exciting and fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is . However , you will suffer from muscle pain for many days you are a first-time rider .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . It is always worth trying something new once in your life time .
segments.speaker: S1
